@poozipotti @algolia @reactjs Good luck with it! Yes, it is rather a broad term. My rule of thumb is something like: "Will I have to maintain a web server to host this?" Since a key part of #JAMstack is being able to host it without the need for a logical server. Recent thoughts: https://t.co/kYYQXYTliP
